title: Inactivation of guanylate kinase in Bacillus sp. TL7-3 cultivated under an optimized ratio of carbon and nitrogen sources influenced GTP regeneration capability and sporulation
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Phetcharat Jaiaue, Piroonporn Srimongkol, Sitanan Thitiprasert, Jirabhorn Piluk, Jesnipit Thammaket, Suttichai Assabumrungrat, Benjamas Cheirsilp, Somboon Tanasupawat, Nuttha Thongchul
